title: Drawing, "Red Cherries and White Stars on Pink Ground, Wallpaper Design", 1940s
medium: Brush and white, red, and pink gouache, gold paint, graphite on heavy cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right:  Parzinger
description: Red and pink cherries decorated with gold abstract flowers and leaves. Pattern is against a pink ground with alternating white stars and red dots [indicated in upper center area only].

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Red Cherries and White Stars on Pink Ground, Wallpaper Design", 1940s.
1940s. Brush and white, red, and pink gouache, gold paint, graphite on heavy cream paper. Gift of Donald Cameron. 1998-19-128.
